title: Investment Lessons Learned from the Poker Table - Ep 18
itunes:title: Investment Lessons Learned from the Poker Table - Ep 18
description:
Having the second best hand in poker is dangerous: You're likely to go all in, and you may win, but you also risk losing it all. There's a lot of this going on in the investing world. Listen to Vitaliy explain the problem – and the solution.

You can read this article online at: https://contrarianedge.com/investment-lessons-learned-from-the-poker-table/
